homeAddressPostcodeHint: You'll need to enter the address manually if it's not in the UK.
error-homeAddressInvalidPostcodeFormat: Postcode must only include letters a to z, numbers and spaces
error-homeAddressInvalidPropertyDetails: Property name or number must only include letters a to z, numbers and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
error-homeAddressNoPostcodeFound: We cannot find this postcode. Enter a different one, or enter the address manually
